comments:
Build ID: I20070410-1043

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a simple project named 'a'
2. Share the project using Pessimistic Simple Provider
3. Create a new text file, a.txt
4. Add a.txt to repository provider's control
5. Close the text editor
6. Open the a.txt, then type 'a' on the Text Editor
 > Failed to checkout with the following RuntimeException in .log

!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.examples.filesystem 4 0 2007-04-24 19:43:01.341
!MESSAGE Context is invalid: org.eclipse.core.resources.team.FileModificationValidationContext@12561256
!STACK 0
java.lang.RuntimeException
	at org.eclipse.team.examples.pessimistic.PessimisticModificationValidator.promptAndCheckout(PessimisticModificationValidator.java:253)
	at org.eclipse.team.examples.pessimistic.PessimisticModificationValidator.checkout(PessimisticModificationValidator.java:298)
	at ...

More information:
This is because any shell cannot be obtained by PessimisticModificationValidator#getShell(Object). On my debugging on 3.3, the type of context was FileModificationValidationContext and the shell could be obtained from the context.
